name: Fishing Knight
description:
While on his day off, Cassian the Knight relaxes by fishing along the bank. Suddenly, a bandit comes and steals his knight gear! Cassian chases the bandit into an old lighthouse nearby. He notices a familiar woman waiting for him, proclaiming his gear is at the top? 

All he has is a fishing pole, but that won't stop him from using it to climb the precarious tower, avoiding slimes along the way, and trying to figure out who that woman is!

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 

Nell's Wizard Adventure is an endless runner developed for UCSC's AGPM 120 series in Spring 2021. This game was made using the Phaser framework, with custom assets, music, and designs.

Development Team: Emil Saechao, Miriam Perez, Naman Bhushan, Paul Lee
